Experiments and tools in AR

Hi! My name is Gerald. I am a developer that dabbles in Augmented Reality, primarily in iOS and ARKit.

AR Translation Proof of Concept

I made a proof of concept of live translating next to your face in AR

A Failed Experiment with a Carousel

When trying to make an inline configuration carousel, I realized while it's a great idea in a UIView, it's a dumb idea in AR

A Carousel of Textures

While working on other things, I discovered how performant it was to switch textures on an `SCNNode`. What if I could switch textures quickly, like at the speed of scroll?
